headlines.description: Romelu Lukaku and Lautaro Martinez scored two goals each as Inter Milan survived a late fightback to beat Sassuolo 4-3 at the Mapei Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Inter survive late comeback to beat Sassuolo

headlines.description: Claudio Ranieri earned a point on his debut as Sampdoria coach with a 0-0 draw against his former employers AS Roma in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ranieri earns cheers but Sampdoria stay bottom

headlines.description: A stunning stoppage-time equaliser from Lecce's Marco Calderoni denied Stefano Pioli a win on his debut as AC Milan coach in a 2-2 draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: AC Milan concede late to draw with Lecce in Pioli's debut
